swimmable

Class Swimmable

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • swimmable.AnimalFactory
        • swimmable.Swimmable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AbstractSeaFactory, MarineAnimal, SeaCreature, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Fish, Jellyfish

    public abstract class Swimmable
extends AnimalFactory
implements SeaCreature, java.lang.Cloneable, MarineAnimal
    This abstract class represents variety types of animals that can swim in the aquarium.
    Author:
    Shai Hod, ID: 304800402
    See Also:
    Fish, Jellyfish
